type.name: section
type.title: Short title.
type.context: RICE (CESS) ACT under Short title. 1.  This Act may be cited as the Rice (Cess) Act.
type.description: This Act may be cited as the Rice (Cess) Act.

type.name: section
type.title: Interpretation.
type.context: RICE (CESS) ACT under Interpretation. 2.  In this Act the Board means the Guyana Rice Marketing Board established under section 3 of the Rice Marketing Act.
type.description: In this Act the Board means the Guyana Rice Marketing Board established under section 3 of the Rice Marketing Act.

type.name: section
type.title: Authority to the Board to pay cess to Accountant General.
type.context: RICE (CESS) ACT under Authority to the Board to pay cess to Accountant General. 3. (1) Anything in  the  Rice  Marketing  Act  to  the  contrary notwithstanding, the Minister may, where it has been agreed between the Government and the Board that it is expedient so to do, by order, authorise and direct the Board to pay to the Accountant General a cess at such rate as may be specified in such order, in respect of the proceeds of the sale of rice by the Board for consumption within Guyana.  (2) The moneys received by the Accountant General under subsection (1) shall be paid into the Consolidated Fund.

description.description: shall be paid into the Consolidated Fund.
